message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product, and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $200, but I'm open to negotiation.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $200 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $200 is my ideal price, I'm willing to come down to $170 to make a deal.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $170 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product.
